verses.name: Psalms 143:5
verses.text: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy works; I muse on the work of thy hands.

verses.name: Psalms 143:6
verses.text: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty land. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 143:7
verses.text: Hear me speedily, O Lord: my spirit faileth: hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit.

verses.name: Psalms 143:8
verses.text: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.
